'''''Vinyar Tengwar 15''''' is the fifteenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|14|16}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Mandos: ''Sinomë fëalya hiruva estë''." — Patrick H. Wynne<br>("In this place your spirit shall find rest.")
* E.L.F. News
* Letters to ''VT''

* "Elvish Linguistic Terms" — Taum Santoski
* "Thus Spake Fëanor" — Tom Loback
* "''Essitalmar'': 'Misplaced Anger' or Plurals in the Sindarin Dialects" (column) — Tom Loback
* "Transitions in Translations: 'Edition Shifting' in the German Hobbit, Part 2" (column) — Arden R. Smith
